title: Yuni Framework
p: Yuni is a cross-platform C++ framework for developing high-level, complex and fast applications. Yuni can be useful in all kinds of applications, from simple 100-line programs to full-blown 3D applications. It intends to provide a complete set of coherent API and to be a reliable and simple bridge between different worlds, allowing to write all sorts of applications while letting the developer focus on her real work.
